childBib.title: Disability Studies Quarterly

children.value: I'm curious how the concept of "acute religious experience" can be applied to political religions like white Supremacy.

childBib.title: Acute Religious Experiences: Madness, Psychosis and Religious Studies

children.value:
Considers applying the social model of disability to pyschopathy. I
think similar questions can be asked of personality disorders,
right-wing authoritarianism, social-dominance orientation, the
authoritarian predisposition, protest whiteness and hypermasculinity.

childBib.title: International Journal of Offender Therapy and Comparative Criminology

children.value:
Analyzes the rhetoric of madness around school shootings. Internet
forums strike me as a kairotic space in the sense Price
discusses. Counter-strategic resistance and counter-diagnostic
strategies of incoherence and proliferation strike me as relevant to
chan culture. The whole rhetoric of facts and logic used in the right
is also relevant here.

childBib.title: Mad at School: Rhetorics of Mental Disability and Academic Life

children.value:
Melanie Yergeau subverts rhetorical disability tropes. Good, but
written in an extremely academic style.

I think the concept of "repressive desublimation" can be applied to
angst and self-destructive qualities. Much of the "alt-right" would
then be a kind of "McFascism", a quick and easy expression of misery
but not a real cartharsis or critique of the capitalist system.

Explains a lot of gender war stuff like incels in reference to the
tension between economic production and social reproduction.
Basically, no one has the free time to have sex anymore.

into
The New Industrial Society

children.value:
Japanese cultural critic, Hiroki Azuma posits otaku culture as a
postmodern genre of media centered around the appreciation of the
schema or database of elements of a work rather than the narrative of
a work.  4chan is directly related to Japanese image board and otaku
culture.

See also for an explainer, Paul Perdijk's article on "Database
Consumption" in
Japanese Media and Popular Culture
at
jmpc-utokyo.com/keyword/database-consumption

childBib.title: Otaku: Japan’s Database Animals

children.value:
Japanese Lacanian psychiatrist, Saitō Tamaki posits an emerging
postmodern archetype of the "phallic girl" central to a large amount
of otaku media.

childBib.title: Beautiful Fighting Girl
Contemporary Japan
Internet Histories

Train Man

as a jumping off point for discussing
cynicism, irony and romanticism in 2channel and Japanese nationalism.

Psychologist and sociologist team, Dr. Jillian Peterson and Dr. James
Densley provide a life history study of American mass shooters.

The

is a better work than most of its type, but is
mostly focused on observing, and disempowering potential shooters.

Extremism' Model" which gathers together a lot of good criticisms of
the counter-extremism industry.

of self-harm.

Discusses British Wicca origins and influences. Exhaustive and

eco-feminism and TERFism but does not discuss the subject.
